name: swarm-message-queue
description: An investigation into Docker Swarm using a Message Queue cluster

scripts.docker:up:requester:
cd docker-zmq && echo "NODE_ENV=$npm_package_config_node_env
NODE_PATH='./services/lib'" > .env && docker-compose up requester
scripts.docker:up:responder:
cd docker-zmq && echo "NODE_ENV=$npm_package_config_node_env
NODE_PATH='./services/lib'" > .env && docker-compose up responder
scripts.docker:up:server:
cd docker-zmq && echo "NODE_ENV=$npm_package_config_node_env
NODE_PATH='./services/lib'" > .env && docker-compose up server
scripts.docker:start:server:
cd docker-zmq && echo "NODE_ENV=$npm_package_config_node_env
NODE_PATH='./services/lib'" > .env && docker-compose start server
scripts.test:
cd docker-zmq && echo "NODE_ENV=test
NODE_PATH='services/lib:tests/lib'" > .env && docker-compose up test
